reviews.review: With good reason, it is considered one of the greatest games of all time. Half-Life 2: Update is a free, slightly better-looking edition of HL2. Some Mods (like the MMod) can jazz up gunplay really nicely. Do consider.

Co na to říct. Prostě Half Life...

I mean, this is Valve's flagship game, and there's really not a whole lot that I could say that others haven't already said. It's Half-Life 2. It's been out for well over a decade at this point, and if you somehow haven't played it yet, you're doing yourself a disservice. 

The game nowadays still manages to hold its own. It looks a little more than dated, sure, but the gameplay is still rock solid. 

Seriously, if you're a Steam user and you haven't played any of the Half-Life games. What are you doing? The game goes on sale for like 2 dollars every other week. You're basically robbing Valve at that point.

Empecé con la saga de Half Life en este año 2021 y la disfruté como si la hubiese jugado en su fecha de lanzamiento, ahora entiendo a la gente que espera con tantas ansias Half-Life 3.

One of the greatest games ever made.  A story that picks up from where the otherwise bare-bones story of half life 1 leaves off.  This physics-based-puzzle-shooter gave interesting gameplay a whole new meaning, with a decent story to boot. 
 Graphics that were ground breaking for its time (and still kind of are) and the in game environments allow innovative and creative ways of exploration that somehow always makes you stumble onto the right path wherever you decide to go.  Spawning an entire cult of PC game enthusiasts surely shows how legendary this franchise and game developer is.  9.6/10

normal bir oyun taş çatlasın 6-7 saat olurken (sıkılıp başından falan kalkarsanız 7-8 bile bulur) bu oyun sadece atmosferi ile bir taşın üstüne çıkıp etrafı izlemenizle 6-7 saat eder o kadar iyi yane :D . hikayesine gelirsek ilk oyundan kaldığı yerden devam ediyor ama abartılı bir bağlantısı yok yani direkt bu oyunu alıp oynayabilirsiniz.
oyunda Gordon Freeman'ın Yanlışlıkla içinden geçtiği dünyada hayatta kalmaya ve direnişçilerle birlikte yarım kalan işi bitirmeye çalışıyoruz. Gordon yine sessiz konuşmayan tip. karakterlerle sempatiyi tamamiyle siz kuracaksınız çünkü Gordon sizsiniz. zaten Gordon konuşsa Alyx'i manit yapıp City 17 İçinde gezip fındık kırarlardı MÜDÜR. neyse şaka bir yana oyun gerçekten 12 saat içinde verebileceği en eğlenceli şeyleri size veriyor. size yön belirtmez. nereye gidecekseniz siz belirleyeceksiniz. karakter konuşmaz çünkü o sizsiniz. yapacağınız her şey tamamiyle sizin zihninize kalmış. tavsiyem indirim mindirim dinlemeyin alın.
mr free man where are your pants mr free man

While this game is good and fun i think it's highly overrated for what it is. 
The gunplay is standard Half-Life/Counter Strike.
The graphics are good for their time.
The physics are THE highlight in this game ofc.
But the story... i don't know if they tried to take themselves too seriously or not. I am probably too much into sci-fi but this game never hit me as anything more than, well , mediocre. I'm gonna get flak for this but i guess people haven't ever read Sci-fi books or watched old films before playing this to realize its not even original or even great.

Still, as a package the game is good for what it is. If you want fun with gunplay and GMOD physics this is your go-to.
Personagem carismatico, o ator que da vida ao personagem então, trabalho excepcional. 10/10

This is actually a zombie game. I was lured by the its very start where you have to fight futuristic troopers and helicopters. This is nothing like Portal 1 or 2. For a game which isn't open world, but it's totally driven by levels, it has labyrinths that one can't find the exit and it keep spawning infinite zombies spawns. It's ridiculous having to watch a walk-through to find the exit of a level. I did it once. The second time I wrote this review instead.

Каждый раз я просыпаюсь в кошмаре и слышу лишь одну фразу "Проснитесь и пойте, Мистер Фримен, проснитесь и пойте"
В очередной раз вижу Барни, Кляйнера, Алекс... О моя милая, Алекс, когда же это закончится. Я ощущаю, что уже десяток раз бывал в местных застенках, однако сегодня я вижу свою цель чётко и ясно! Мне нужно пройти игру на 100%, только так я смогу стать вновь свободным. Вновь прорываюсь через сотни комбайнов, через десятки сломанных судеб, монтировка всё плотнее и плотнее прилегает ко мне, словно она стала продолжением моей руки. И вот спустя каких-то 12 часов прохождения понимаю, что я вовсе не Гордон Фримен с которым всё это время ассоциировал себя, недостоин я звания великого героя, я всего-лишь G-Man, во власти которого высвобождать и забирать в небытие Гордона. Цитадель взорвалась, игра пройдена на 100% а значит настало то самое время! Пора наконец-то дать отдохнуть старику.  Всё уже давно готово для нашей встречи. Тяжёлая фомка отправляется в дальний угол комнаты, костюм на дезактивацию, а уставшее тело Гордона в кресло. 

-Рад снова видеть тебя, старый друг!
-Ну как прошло в этот раз?
-Кстати, ты так и не закончил в прошлый раз, как там говоришь звали того вортигонта?
Un bon FPS comme on en voit rarement de nos jours.  N'hésitez pas à vous le procurer. Tout est bien balancé et varié: armes, ennemis, niveaux.. Le tout avec une très bonne histoire. Un classique!

Since it keeps crashing near the end i would deem it unplayeble - this game is a buggy mess and since its so old - valve is never gonna patch it - dont bother with it - i'tried it with multiple hardware configurations and if you happen to save at a certain point near the end it'll always crash on you. there are better and more stable games to spend your money on. if you can get it for free - its a good game - otherwise stay away from it - tbh - i've played alphpa games, that are more stable -.-

Bastante recomendado la verdad, solo que si eres una persona acostumbrada a juegos frenéticos o te desespera detenerte o bajar el ritmo del juego por ratos te va a acabar desesperando.
